meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Drifting</kanji> down the <kanji>stream</kanji>. Something that is doing this is <vocabulary>drifting</vocabulary>. It could also be the <vocabulary>drift</vocabulary> of something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
